Get actionable insights, fast

With a user-friendly platform and versatile functionalities, FeedbackLabs makes it easy to start capturing the input you need in a matter of minutes.

Start Getting Answers

No credit card required

14-day free trial

Cancel anytime

1

Create a channel and select the type of feedback you want to gather

From your Dashboard, click on the ‘New Channel’ button to create a new Feedback Channel. Name your channel and select the survey type that best fits your needs. You can choose between NPS® and 5-Star Rating, and soon you’ll be able to create CES and CSAT surveys too.

Don’t see your preferred survey type? Let us know, and we’ll make it happen!

Choose how you want to gather your feedback

Improve your response rates by engaging customers right where they are — on the devices and platforms they already know and use. With FeedbackLabs, you can collect stakeholder feedback through email, on your website, and on mobile devices. Or use people segmenting to survey your stakeholders in the moment across multiple channels.

2
3

Customize the look and feel of your survey

Use our editor to customize your survey, including colors, the shape and style of buttons, and FeedbackLabs branding visibility. Upload your company logo to reinforce your brand (PNG, JPG, and GIF files are currently supported). Edit email details, including the sender’s name, from and reply-to email addresses, subject line, as well as the main rating question.

Ask a follow-up question, get more context

After your respondents answer the main rating question, give them an opportunity to share more about their experience with a follow-up question. Either show the same follow-up question to everyone in a specific channel or show different questions based on scores. You can also display a custom thank-you message to the user after they provide feedback to encourage them to follow you on social media, leave a review, or refer a friend.

4
5

Invite people to share their feedback

Finally, upload the list of contacts who should receive invites to provide feedback. Uploading contacts is as easy as uploading a CSV file or copy-pasting a list of emails. Control how, when, and how frequently invites are sent. You can use each of your channels to send a one-time feedback invite or gather continuous feedback with our Invite Scheduler.

Analyze feedback in real-time and take action

FeedbackLabs allows you to surface the right insights and take fast, appropriate action. See all your data in real-time in your Feedback Feed; all incoming feedback is instantly available to you and your team on a single dashboard. Take a clear view into survey completion rates, response rates, and views. Receive instant email notifications or Slack alerts so your team can take action — quickly.

6
